member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro
member.summary: A Gyro module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance.
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.Calibrate
member.summary: Calibrates the gyro values. Ensure that the sensor is not moving when calling this method.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.RequestSingleMeasurement
member.summary: Obtains a single measurement and raises the event when complete.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.StartTakingMeasurements
member.summary: Starts taking measurements and fires MeasurementComplete when a new measurement is available.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.StopTakingMeasurements
member.summary: Stops taking measurements.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.LowPassFilter
member.summary: The low pass filter configuration. Note that setting the low pass filter to 256Hz results in a maximum internal sample rate of 8kHz. Any other setting results in a maximum sample rate of 1kHz. The sample rate can be further divided by using SampleRateDivider.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.SampleRateDivider
member.summary: the internal sample rate divider. The gyro outputs are sampled internally at either 8kHz (if the LowPassFilter is set to 256Hz) or 1kHz for any other LowPassFilter settings. This setting can be used to further divide the sample rate.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.MeasurementInterval
member.summary: The interval at which measurements are taken.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.MeasurementComplete
member.summary: Raised when a measurement reading is complete.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.Bandwidth
member.summary: Available low pass filter bandwidth settings.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.Bandwidth.Hertz256
member.summary: 256Hz

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.Bandwidth.Hertz188
member.summary: 188Hz

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.Bandwidth.Hertz98
member.summary: 98Hz

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.Bandwidth.Hertz42
member.summary: 42Hz

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.Bandwidth.Hertz20
member.summary: 20Hz

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.Bandwidth.Hertz10
member.summary: 10Hz

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.Bandwidth.Hertz5
member.summary: 5Hz

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.MeasurementCompleteEventArgs
member.summary: Event arguments for the MeasurementComplete event.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.MeasurementCompleteEventArgs.ToString
member.summary: Provides a string representation of the instance.
member.returns: A string describing the values contained in the object.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.MeasurementCompleteEventArgs.X
member.summary: Angular rate around the X axis (roll) in degree per second.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.MeasurementCompleteEventArgs.Y
member.summary: Angular rate around the Y axis (pitch) in degree per second.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.MeasurementCompleteEventArgs.Z
member.summary: Angular rate around the Z axis (yaww) in degree per second.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.MeasurementCompleteEventArgs.Temperature
member.summary: Temperature in degree celsius.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Gyro.MeasurementCompleteEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate used for the MeasurementComplete event.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
